description:
Put your project pants on. Burly with enough stretch for technical foot-trickery, these slim-fitting climbing pants are cut to work with a harness. Reinforced knees stand up to off-widths or scruffy top-outs.

  • Heavyweight cotton, spandex fabric
  • Stretch waistband with drawcord sits flat under a harness
  • 2 front pockets and 2 rear pockets are accessible with a harness on
  • Stretch cuffs keep your feet free for heel hooking
  • Gusseted crotch offers room for wide stemming or hand-foot matching
name: Black Diamond Notion Sport Pants - Women's
